mapper.insert: INSERT INTO walk_crew SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, district_id = #{districtId}, leaderId = #{leaderId}, createdAt = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, district_id AS districtId, leaderId, createdAt FROM walk_crew WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT wc.id, wc.title, wc.description, wc.district_id AS districtId, wc.leaderId, wc.createdAt, m.nickname, d.city, d.district, d.dong FROM walk_crew wc LEFT JOIN member m ON wc.leaderId = m.id LEFT JOIN district d ON wc.district_id = d.id ORDER BY wc.createdAt DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE walk_crew SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, area = #{area}, leaderId = #{leaderId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO walk_crew_member SET memberId = #{memberId}, crewId = #{crewId}, joinedAt = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT wc.id, wc.title, wc.description, wc.district_id AS districtId, wc.leaderId, wc.createdAt, m.nickname, d.city, d.district, d.dong FROM walk_crew wc INNER JOIN member m ON wc.leaderId = m.id INNER JOIN district d ON wc.district_id = d.id ORDER BY wc.createdAt DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM walk_crew_member WHERE crewId = #{crewId} AND memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO walk_crew_member (crewId, memberId, joinedAt) VALUES (#{crewId}, #{memberId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS memberId, m.name AS memberName, wcm.joinedAt AS joinedAt FROM walk_crew_member wcm INNER JOIN member m ON wcm.memberId = m.id WHERE wcm.crewId = #{crewId}

SELECT m.id AS memberId, m.name AS memberName, m.nickname AS memberNickname, m.address AS memberAddress, m.authLevel, wcm.joinedAt FROM walk_crew_member wcm INNER JOIN member m ON wcm.memberId = m.id WHERE wcm.crewId = #{crewId} AND wcm.memberId = #{memberId}
